docs.text: Welcome to Mentally Strong Welcome! This portal contains a summary of wisdom presented in the beautiful book 13 things mentally strong people don't do by Amy Morin, LCSW I have collated all the text I highlighted when I went through the book and have presented them here with some beautiful images!
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome! This portal contains a summary of wisdom presented in the beautiful book 13 things mentally strong people don't do by Amy Morin, LCSW I have collated all the text I highlighted when I went through the book and have presented them here with some beautiful images!
docs.title: Welcome to Mentally Strong

docs.text: They don't give away their power When you decide that no one else has the power to control how you feel , you will experience empowerment!
docs.title: Do not give away Power
They don't give away their power
When you decide that no one else has the power to control how you feel, you will experience empowerment!
